Title: Without seeds flowers don't grow, without culture it is difficult to manage affairs, all together study culture, realizing the Four Modernizations must depend on that
Designer: Sichuan meishu xueyuan (四川美术学院)Huang Yiping (黄一萍)
Publisher: Sichuan renmin chubanshe (四川人民出版社)
Notes: An exhortation to fight illiteracy as a condition of progress, against the backdrop of the Great Leap Forward. The Four Modernizations from the title are not the same as those of the 1980s. Note the cropduster!
